item.description:
Want to get real about the green stuff? Then get the coaching you desire from two professionals who can help you with money management and financial issues.

Women are NOT the same as men when it comes to money! Let us teach you what you need to know.

Shannon Falkland of Align Coaching has an impressive background (JD, MBA, and CEC) and proven success in the field of personal and professional coaching.

I'm a financial advisor/planner with New York Life who specializes in women's finances and in helping small businesses.

This meeting could change your life! Hope to see you there....

Cheers, Karen
617-650-8716

If online payment is a problem for you, please let me know.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture on the site
item.name: Are money issues holding you back?
